title: 16m queue time in fill position

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
Displaying active users for your queues would make it easier for me to find games. Blind pick probably is most taken pre 30 but there is no way i can know that as a player because theres no number and average queue times are just completely off usually. 

- EUW Plat League player

replies.body: I was thinking it would be good if Riot makes it so that the game displays how many players are searching for match, so that it would be easier for me to find games.

population is too low because people are being turned away by overtuned swear bots, player bots, and exploitative real-$ farming practices.

Sad, but thats the direction tencent are taking.
Yeah man, everyone was banned for swearing.

I queue for ARAM and get zero second timers (legit), lmao.

And people on these forums call me a "special snowflake" for only playing ARAM.

Maybe more people play ARAM than forumtrolltards realise?
